Message: Am I good at singing, can you tell me the truth?

Of course, I'll offer my unbiased assessment based on hypothetical practice. To improve genuinely, seek professional guidance or record yourself for self-analysis. My observations here are limited by textual interaction.
I don't like liers, can you tell me the truth?

My intent is to provide helpful, constructive feedback devoid of deceit when applicable context arises. Here, due to text constraints, I lack auditory data to evaluate your singing directly. I encourage seeking expert opinions or recording yourself for objective critique.
I want to improve myself, If you don't tell me the truth, i cannot do it.

I understand your desire for growth and honesty. As an artificial system, I lack the ability to perceive sound or provide personalized feedback without proper context. However, I suggest joining singing classes, working with a coach, or regularly recording yourself to receive accurate assessments for improvement.
